boat.name: Gretel
boat.full_description:
Gretel has a cabin with bunk cushions, a porta -pottie and a spirit  stove.  She has a battery with a solar panel and nav ,lights,depth  sounder and log.

The fittings have all been replaced  with stainless and she has  Anderson winches.  The epoxied plate is a replacement, and  she has lead ballast, and new plate bolt and  winch. Apart from the standard sails she has a storm jib and a  spinnaker..She has a 3/4 cover and little used mercury 3.5 outboard.
boat.short_description: Gretel.is a cabin version of the popular Memory19

for_sales.sales_text:
Gretel has a cabin with bunk cushions, a porta-pottie and a spirit stove. She has a battery with a solar panel and nav ,lights,depth sounder and log.

The fittings have all been replaced with stainless and she has Anderson winches. The epoxied plate is a replacement, and she has lead ballast, and new plate bolt and winch. Apart from the standard sails she has a storm jib and a spinnaker..She has a 3/4 cover and little used mercury 3.5 outboard. She has a trolley by Tyrone Snell with winch and tow-hitch for an extra Â£500.
